Title: Serving up a delicacy
Content: Once upon a time, there was a story which had no ‘moral lesson’ in it. It was lovely. The end.Which child doesn’t long for a break from the bitter pills of life-lessons hidden in sweet-looking parable
Author: Maithreyi Karnoor
Description: Once upon a time, there was a story which had no ‘moral lesson’ in it. It was lovely. The end.Which child doesn’t long for a break from the bitter pills of life-lessons hidden in sweet-looking parable
